Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.name: SaaS-Laptop onboarding
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.variables: <variables><VAR_INSTALL_PATH class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_CVAUTOMATION class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_AUTO_LOCATION class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_JSON_STRING class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_NETWORK_PASSWORD class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_WORKFLOW_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_WORKFLOW_STATUS class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">COMPLETED</VAR_WORKFLOW_STATUS></variables>

children.displayName: Email address for the Automation report:
children.name: INP_EMAIL

children.displayName: Service pack revision for custom package
children.name: INP_SP_revision

children.displayName: Network path to copy custom packages:
children.name: INP_NetworkPathToCopyPackages

children.displayName: User having access to the network path
children.name: INP_NetworkUser

children.displayName: Password to access the network path
children.name: INP_NetworkPassword

children.displayName: [52996] [Laptop] - MSP Plans - Create package WITHOUT auth code and silent install WITH /authcode option
children.name: INP_52996

children.displayName: [53705] [Laptop] - MSP Plans - Create custom package WITHOUT auth code and silent install **WITHOUT /authcode and REGISTER from tenant user
children.name: INP_53705

children.displayName: Input json file location for Automation
children.name: CONF_EXECUTE_JSON

Activity.description: Execute a command on a remote machine
Activity.name: ExecuteCommand

inputs.val: <inputs><client class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity" _list_="false"><clientName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><clientId class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false" /><clientName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><hostName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><clientGUID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><displayName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><commCellName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><csGUID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><type class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.CommCellType" _list_="false" /><flags class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.EntityFlags" _list_="false" /><GUID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><newName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></client><impersonateUserName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><impersonateUserPassword class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false" /><startUpPath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><command class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">python "xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_CVAUTOMATION}"</command><arguments class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">--inputJSON xpath:{/workflow/configuration/CONF_EXECUTE_JSON}</arguments><waitForProcessCompletion class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</waitForProcessCompletion></inputs>

Activity.description: executes queries against a commcell database
Activity.name: CommServDBQuery

inputs.val: <inputs><commCell /><query>SELECT attrVal FROM APP_ClientProp WHERE attrName = 'Patch Local Location' AND componentNameId = 2</query></inputs>

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="// Creating json file input xml string

try
{
 String common_inputs = "				\"InstanceName\": \"defaultinstancename\","+
 "				\"ClientName\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/system/commCellName}+"\","+
 "				\"BackupsetName\": \"defaultBackupSet\","+
 "				\"AgentName\": \"File System\","+
 "				\"SubclientName\": \"default\","+
 "				\"Tenant_company\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_Tenant_company}+"\","+
 "				\"Default_Plan\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_Default_Plan}+"\","+
 "				\"Windows_machine_host_name\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_Windows_machine_host_name}+"\","+
 "				\"Windows_machine_user_name\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_Windows_machine_user_name}+"\","+
 "				\"Windows_machine_password\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_Windows_machine_password}+"\","+
 "				\"Windows_Activation_User\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_Windows_Activation_User}+"\","+ 
 "				\"Mac_machine_host_name\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_Mac_machine_host_name}+"\","+
 "				\"Mac_machine_user_name\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_Mac_machine_user_name}+"\","+
 "				\"Mac_machine_password\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_Mac_machine_password}+"\","+
 "				\"Mac_Activation_User\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_Mac_Activation_User}+"\","+
 "				\"SP_revision\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_SP_revision}+"\""; 
 
 String input_json = "{"+
 "	\"commcell\": {"+
 "		\"commcellUsername\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_CommcellUser}+"\","+
 "		\"commcellPassword\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_CommcellPassword}+"\","+
 "		\"webconsoleHostname\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/system/commCellHost}+"\""+
 "	},"+
 "	\"email\": {"+
 " \"receiver\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_EMAIL}+"\""+
 "	},"+
 "	\"testCasesInfo\": {"+
 "		\"ParallelExecution\": false,"+
 "		\"testCases\": {";
 
 if (xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_52996}.equals("true")){ input_json += "\"52996\": {" + common_inputs +"}";}
 if (xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_53705}.equals("true"))
 { 
 input_json += ",\"53705\": {" + common_inputs + ",";
 input_json += "\"Mac_Activation_Password\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_Mac_Activation_Password}+"\","+
 "\"Windows_Activation_Password\": \""+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_Mac_Activation_Password}+"\"";
 input_json += "}";
 }
 input_json += "		},"+
 "		\"UpdateQA\": false"+
 "	}"+
 "}";
 
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_JSON_STRING", input_json);
 logger.info("INFO: VAR_JSON_STRING = ["+input_json+"]");
}
catch(e)
{
 logger.info("EXCEPTION: ["+e+"]");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_MESSAGE","Failed to create json input. Exception: " + e);
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_STATUS","FAILED");
} " /></inputs>

Activity.description: Execute a command on a remote machine
Activity.name: ExecuteCommand

inputs.val: <inputs><client class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity" _list_="false"><clientName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><clientId class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false" /><clientName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><hostName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><clientGUID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><displayName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><commCellName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><csGUID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><type class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.CommCellType" _list_="false" /><flags class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.EntityFlags" _list_="false" /><GUID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><newName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></client><impersonateUserName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><impersonateUserPassword class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false" /><startUpPath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><command class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">echo xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_JSON_STRING} > xpath:{/workflow/configuration/CONF_EXECUTE_JSON}</command><arguments class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><waitForProcessCompletion class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</waitForProcessCompletion></inputs>

Activity.description: Execute a script on a remote machine
Activity.name: ExecuteScript

inputs.val:
<inputs><client class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity" _list_="false"><clientName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><clientId class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false" /><clientName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><hostName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><clientGUID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><displayName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><commCellName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><csGUID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><type class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.CommCellType" _list_="false" /><flags class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.EntityFlags" _list_="false" /><GUID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><newName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></client><impersonateUserName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><impersonateUserPassword class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false" /><startUpPath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><scriptType class="commvault.msgs.App.ScriptType" _list_="false">PowerShell</scriptType><script class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">Copy-Item "xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_AUTO_LOCATION}\\temp\\Mac_Client.pkg" "xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_NetworkPathToCopyPackages}\\xpath:{/workflow/configuration/INP_MacPackageName}"
Copy-Item "xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_AUTO_LOCATION}\\temp\\WinX64_Client.exe" "xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_NetworkPathToCopyPackages}\\xpath:{/workflow/configuration/INP_Winx64PackageName}"
Copy-Item "xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_AUTO_LOCATION}\\temp\\Win32_Client.exe" "xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_NetworkPathToCopyPackages}\\xpath:{/workflow/configuration/INP_WINx86PackageName}"
</script><arguments class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><waitForProcessCompletion class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</waitForProcessCompletion></inputs>

Activity.description: Execute a script on a remote machine
Activity.name: ExecuteScript

inputs.val: <inputs><client class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity" _list_="false"><clientName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><clientId class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false" /><clientName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><hostName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><clientGUID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><displayName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><commCellName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><csGUID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><type class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.CommCellType" _list_="false" /><flags class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.EntityFlags" _list_="false" /><GUID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><newName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></client><impersonateUserName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><impersonateUserPassword class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false" /><startUpPath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><scriptType class="commvault.msgs.App.ScriptType" _list_="false">PowerShell</scriptType><script class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">Copy-Item "xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_AUTO_LOCATION}\temp\WinX64_Proxy.exe" "xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_NetworkPathToCopyPackages}\xpath:{/workflow/configuration/INP_WINx64ProxyPackageName}" Copy-Item "xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_AUTO_LOCATION}\temp\Win32_Proxy.exe" "xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_NetworkPathToCopyPackages}\xpath:{/workflow/configuration/INP_Winx86ProxyPackageName}"</script><arguments class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><waitForProcessCompletion class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</waitForProcessCompletion></inputs>

inputs.val: <inputs><client class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity" _list_="false"><clientName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><clientId class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false" /><clientName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><hostName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><clientGUID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><displayName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><commCellName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><csGUID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><type class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.CommCellType" _list_="false" /><flags class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.EntityFlags" _list_="false" /><GUID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><newName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></client><impersonateUserName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><impersonateUserPassword class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false" /><startUpPath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><scriptType class="commvault.msgs.App.ScriptType" _list_="false">PowerShell</scriptType><script class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">net use "xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_NetworkPathToCopyPackages}" /user:xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_NetworkUser} xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_NETWORK_PASSWORD}</script><arguments class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><waitForProcessCompletion class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</waitForProcessCompletion></inputs>

Activity.description: executes a set of activities when the workflow completes
